content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory Interface at Position(2.5, 17.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Cable Factory Input Chest at Position(2.5, 17.5)
– Factory Burner Inserter at Position(3.5, 17.5) (using direction RIGHT)
– Assembling Machine at Position(1.5, 19.5)

### Depot Belt System at Position(3.5, 15.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Wooden Chest (belt depot) at Position(3.5, 15.5)
– Transport Belt Segment at Position(4.5, 15.5)
– Depot Burner Inserter at Position(3.5, 14.5) (using direction UP)

### Extraction System
Consists of the following entities:
– Extraction System Burner Inserter at Position(–3.5, 27.5) with drop position Position(–3.5, 28.5)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Transport Belt Connection Errors  
  Ensure that transport belts are connected to an appropriate inserter rather than directly to a steam engine. Always verify the target entity’s type before attempting a connection.

• Placement Distance Issues  
  When an error indicates that a placement target (for example, a wooden chest at (3.5,15.5)) is too far from the player’s current position, move closer to the target before trying to place the entity.

• Inventory Shortage Alerts  
  If placement fails due to the required item not being in inventory (as occurred with the wooden chest), confirm that the item is available before initiating placement.

• Undefined Variable Warnings  
  Review and correct variable names (for example, ensuring that ‘target_chest’ is defined) to prevent NameError exceptions.
